channel.title: Need help with adding npc's to my server
channel.description:
yeah, title pretty much says all, ive read alot of tutorials for this, and i know that they work for alot of peeps, but none work for me, i have cheezscape source, and i can add one fine, but when i try to attack it, moparscape freezes. someone told me that i should add health to them, but i cant figure out how, because when i add them to autospawn.cfg there isnt a health column. only their npcid, ranges, height, walk type, and description, please help me.
thanking you and advance!

item.dc:creator: @mehaku mehaku
item.description:
@mehaku wrote:

yeah, i got the whole list from the forums, so it has almost all health things, im trying to add tyras guards- like in testscape- to all the same places in testscape, and when i do, it still freezes, if healths not my problem plz tell me what is, i checked, and tyras guard is in my npc.cfg, and their hp is correct, so why cant i attack them?
